## addLocation() function

Adds the current location to the context

**Signature:**

```typescript
addLocation: (location: string, context: MatchContext) => MatchContext
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

location


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

[MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md)

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md)

a new [MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md) with updated location.
